# Gene Set Enrichment Analysis for WGBS Data
In this project, we will analyze DNA methylation patterns using `methylGSA` on WGBS data to identify enriched gene sets.

```{r}
#installing methylGSA
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
    
BiocManager::install("methylGSA")
```
```{r}
BiocManager::install("ChAMP")
library(ChAMP)

```
